body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (8-14 Days)

 

Modern High 5-Tier Indoor/Outdoor LED Floor Water Fountain

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Color: GRAY

Features:

  • Garden Fountain: Freshened Up Landscape and Patio Areas with Our Decorative Garden Water Fountain Design.
  • Floor Fountain: Perfect Addition with Modern Design and Built-in Pump That Will Enchant Your Yard and Guests with Its Attractive Appearance.
  • Lightweight Cast Resin Construction Makes This Design Easy To Move.
  • Includes UL-listed Recirculating Water Pump; Plugs Into Any Grounded Outdoor Wall Outlet.
  • Outdoor Water Fountain Size:(L X W X H): 13.4*14.2*40inch

Details: Looking for a new touch to add to your garden? Why not try out our Tiering Bowls Fountain with LED Light. Light adds a nice addition to the already picturesque fountain. Pick yours up today.

 

Specifications:

-For indoor and outdoor use

-Fiber-reinforced resin construction

-Built in Led light

-Power supply: 110 v -Power cord (6.6 foot )

More Details:

-Made from fiber-reinforced resin composite, and it is a material that provides unparalleled strength, durability.

-There is an adjustment on the pump, water flow is adjustable.

-Comes with quick set up instruction,easy to set up and maintain.

Caring for your water fountain:

If the pump cannot pump water check if the power is correctly connected or check if sufficient water is inside the reservoir. That the reservoir is at least 3/4 full of water. The pump must be completely submerged into the water. These fountains should be cleaned once every few days. Winter protection (for outdoor only)

* During the winter period we recommend that you empty the feature of water and store in a sheltered location, eg. Garden shed or garage. Remove the pump and clean. Store in a dry, frost-free location.


Water Fountain Includes:

-1*Water Fountain

-1*Power cord (6.6 foot)

-1*Quick set up instruction

-1*Recirculating UL listed pump

Note: There might be slightly difference in color due to the differences in lighting and computer monitor settings. Please note that the fountains are handmade crafts and measurements may vary slightly. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions, we will provide the best services to you !

title: Modern Wood Finish Drum Shade Floor Lamp
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide

(7-12 Days)

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

Color: Brown

Features:

  • UNIQUE, ELEGANT BEDROOM FLOOR LAMP FOR READING OR SOFT, MOOD LIGHTING - Give your bedroom a classy touch with an elegant, drum shade up-light. Use it at bedside for a bright but not overwhelming reading light, or place the lamp a little further away so the shade's effect is greater and you have a nice ambience with soft, warm white light.
  • CONTEMPORARY WOOD FINISH LOOK FITS WITH NEARLY ANY LIVING ROOM OR OFFICE DÉCOR: Works well with many decor styles such as mid century modern, traditional, minimalist, urban, rustic and industrial styles. This is thanks to the shade that diffuses both up-light and downlight, making it a great choice to place beside the couch or executive desk.
  • ALEXA COMPATIBLE FREE STANDING UPLIGHT - HEAVY BASE MAKES IT SAFE FOR KIDS' ROOMS - Works with Alexa / Echo, Google Home Assistant & Apple Homekit (Siri) to turn on/off. (Requires smart plug sold separately.) The heavy base makes this lamp very unlikely to tip, even if knocked by kids or pets, a feature helpful in general and especially for guest rooms.
  • 20 YEAR LIFE WARM WHITE LED BULB INCLUDED: This lamp includes an LED bulb rated to last 20,000 hours, which works out to a 20 year life with normal use (about 3 hours / day). You never have to replace a bulb and save 90% on your electric bill in comparison incandescent bulbs, because LED doesn't waste lots of energy by producing heat. This also avoids accidental burns if you touch the light.
  • 3 YEAR PRODUCT WARRANTY: We proudly stand behind all of our products 100%, which is why we offer a full 3 year warranty. If your lamp has any defect or stops working within 3 years, we help you troubleshoot and/or send replacement parts or a whole new product. If any problems arise, please contact us because our number one goal is customer satisfaction.

Details:

The Lucas LED sophisticated lamp is always ready to turn in a strong performance while staying focused on the bigger picture. No matter what role Lucas needs to fill in your living or work space, this prestigious flame-keeper will always be prepared to get the job done using a very particular set of skills with style. Liven up your den while investing into cost effective LED lighting equipment providing practical warm light that will help you save money on your power bill for years to come.

The glowing shades illuminating from the ambient light of Lucas cast an empowered aura into any room's atmosphere. Easy install lights such as the Lucas diffuser shade lamp are the perfect solution for renters, apartment lease situations, dorm room dwellers, and even homeowners who might not have time to install more complicated lighting fixtures. No holes to drill, no sheetrock to cut, and no hassle to setting perfect mood lighting for any occasion!

Replacement Bulbs Made Easy

Designed to have a standard E26 socket base for the included LightPro LED Bulb. These bulbs feature 800 Lumens of 3,000 Kelvin color temperature illumination that lasts for over 45,000 hours. Chances are you will not need a replacement any time soon, but when you do, they will be easy to find!

Modern Luxury, Stylish Design

The sturdy base and designer elliptical shaped Maple Eucalyptus Wood pole of Lucas are constructed from high quality materials before being christened with stylish shades and brushed steel accents. A switch located on the pole of this shade lamp conveniently provides a simple way to set perfect lighting for any occasion. From bachelor pads and diva lounges to family living rooms or professional waiting rooms, the Lucas LED Floor Lamp will look and feel right at home.


Package Dimensions: 22.0 x 18.0 x 6.1 inches

Q: How to order extra parts?
A: Please message us which parts you need (better with the code in the installation guide), we accept Paypal. Extra parts orders will be shipping from our factory in China, take around 9-15 days to arrive.

Q: Can it be used on a sloped/slanted ceiling?
A: For pendant lighting, yes, they can, but we don't recommend since the fixture may weigh the hanging cord down then shorten the longevity of the lighting. For ceiling lights, we don't recommend either, but technically they can be used on it. You can always message us for details.

The warm light, white light and cold light emitted from the front of the illuminating mirror are bright enough. The color temperature is between 3000-6000K. Even if it is broken, it will not shatter to pieces, no harm, more safe to use. With epoxy coating, this mirror is corrosion proof. It will not get corroded after our 30 day acid test. Tempered Led Bathroom Mirrors are safer and stronger than glass mirrors on the market.
  • 【Ani-Fogged/Waterproof Design】Our wall mounted mirror has anti-fog function, you only need to press the button and wait for a few minutes to get a clear reflection image. A simple touch sensitive on/off button makes turning your LED lights on and off as easy as the swipe of your finger.

title: Ninja Dragon GPS WiFi RC Drone with 4K HD Camera
body_html:
Ninja Dragon Stealth G907M GPS Quadcopter RC Drone with 4K Camera

This RC drone is equipped with built-in GPS and optical flow positioning system enable it with a stable and accurate flight.

Built in High-definition 4K Camera, 5G WiFi FPV Real-time Transmission with Gesture Video/Photo and Follow Me Mode.

GPS Smart Follow: After the aircraft links to GPS, the APP follow function is turned on, and the aircraft follows the mobile phone.

The optical flow position is mounted  in the horizontal direction, and the air pressure is set at a high altitude to achieve stable flying making the picture clearer.

Upgraded GPS positioning system, the drone will fly back to home with one button. It will also fly back to home automatically when there is low power and if it detects losing control due to out of distance.

HD 4K CAMERA - The high resolution 4K camera with 90 degree adjustable angle and 5G WiFi image transmission captures provides you with an outstanding image quality and experience. 

Follow me mode - Just choose the master mode and face the aircraft lens. After the target person is locked, the drone could always follow your steps and point the camera to you.

Image following: 1-5m from the aircraft to identify the subject and perform automatic follow-up flight.

Gesture Video & Photo Mode - When facing the front lens of the camera, specified gestures can be recognized and connect to the camera function of the aircraft. You can take photos by Gestures.

Gesture shooting recognition: within 1-5m from the aircraft, make a camera gesture/camera gesture to the camera.

Multi-point planning flight of the route: The aircraft autonomously flies according to the preset route, and the player concentrates on shooting.

Spot Surround: Find the center point around and move the desired surround radius with the joystick.

The aircraft recovery function: continuously click the GPS signal icon 3 times to open the map interface, the map shows the final distance of the aircraft, the latitude and longitude position.

MV features: filters, video effects, background music, photo/video sharing

This LED lighting will endure for 20 years without burning out, with average use. It saves energy by not producing heat, so it outlasts energy wasting halogen CFL or incandescent bulbs. Save money and energy with the Trilage. Max Wattage 60 W CFL. Note: Bulbs not dimmable.
  • SATISFACTION GUARANTEED WARRANTY: We proudly stand behind all of our products 100%, which is why we offer a full 3 year warranty. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us because our number one goal is customer satisfaction and we are committed to making it right for you. 

Details:

For a lamp that looks high-end and ultra-mod, Trilage Floor Lamp in Oil Brushed Bronze Finish enlivens your living room décor at a friendly price. Three woven-textured drum shades in burlap dangle from curved metal poles, providing a warm tone to your lighting. The oatmeal-hued cylinder shades are open at top and bottom, and the flexible rods above them may be moved from side to side in order to meet your lighting needs. Group the lights closely together, or separate the shades from one another by approximately 24 inches. (Please note that pole length is NOT adjustable.) A solid metal base prevents tipping and rises only two inches in height, thereby sliding easily under sofas and couches.

Although the Trilage doesn't dim, it features a rotary switch on the main pole that lets you opt for illuminating one, two, or all three lights in turn. Turn once to bring up the right shade only. This gives you the ambiance mood lighting you want, even without a dimmer. Turn again, and the right goes out while the left and center lights come up. This gives you enough light to read comfortably by. Turn a third time, and all 3 lights will be illuminated. With 60-watts bulbs (or the LED equivalent) the Trilage provides sufficient brightness for a 15 x 20 foot living room. Turn a fourth time to power off. (Bulbs not included.)

Package Dimensions: 34.0 x 15.5 x 13.9 inches

Details: Revitalize your skin from the inside out with the Redecker Natural Pig Bristle Bath Brush with Oiled Pearwood Handle Perfect for massaging all parts of the body, this exfoliating shower brush with a handcrafted oiled pearwood handle can be used wet or dry for healthier, softer, more radiant skin. Long removable handle helps scrub your back and other hard-to-reach areas and facilitates controlled, natural brush strokes.

Firm, all-natural pig bristle is flexible and soft enough to scrub delicate skin, stimulate blood circulation and enhance metabolism for healthier skin and digestive system. Effectively exfoliates dry and dead skin cells to reveal brighter, fresher, younger looking skin, unclog pores and boost collagen production. Extra-long 17" brush features a detachable oiled pearwood handle that's easily removed for handheld scrubbing. A cotton belt keeps hand in place for better control and fluidity of movement. To clean, rinse bristles gently in warm water and air dry with bristles facing down. Made in Germany.

The first handcrafted Bürstenhaus Redecker brushes were produced in 1935. A lot has changed since then. Today, the name Bürstenhaus Redecker stands as it has for many years for an ideal combination of natural quality, function and design. It lives from the blend of inventiveness, sound craftsmanship and creativity. Handcrafted in Germany, Bürstenhaus Redecker brushes are made of domestic woods, bristles, hair, and plant fibers, and have been for decades. Precedence is given to natural, sustainable raw materials.

This natural men's facial cleanser is 97.5% natural and 72% organic. Scented with a refreshing blend of peppermint, eucalyptus, and lemongrass essential oils. All our products contain zero sulfates, parabens, glycols, phthalates, petrochemicals, silicones, PEG's, sulfates, synthetic fragrances, or gluten. Always vegan, no animal testing, 100% Certified Organic ingredients when possible. Click "Add to Cart" to have a clean, shine free and energized face.

 

 

The complete daily skincare routine for men to maintain healthy skin. The three products in this men’s skin care kit work together to deliver a complete skincare routine that gives immediate and noticeable results. Designed for oily and normal skin types.

The Clarifying Gel Face Wash for men provides a rich, foaming experience that washes away oil using powerful coconut based cleansers. Aloe renews the skin and geranium acts as a powerful anti-septic cleansing away facial impurities. The result is a brighter, clearer complexion. Recommended for normal, to oily & combination skin.

The Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for men is a light, fast-absorbing oil free men's facial moisturizer packed with potent natural ingredients to hydrate, nourish, renew, and protect your face, without clogging pores. The result is clearer and firmer skin, keeping you looking younger, longer. This is an oil free face lotion for men.

Our Renewing Face Scrub for men uses powerful natural scrubbing particles to remove dead skin cells. It  unclogs pores, exfoliates and breaks down tough facial hair for better skin and a comfortable shave.

*For men with with dry or senstive skin, check out our Advanced Face Care Routine II which includes our Purifying Charcoal Face Wash. 



How To Use:

 

Step 1: Wash your face morning & night with our Clarifying Gel Face Wash for men to remove facial impurities, oil, & shine which prevent a bright, clear complexion.

Step 2: Gently exfoliate your skin with our Renewing Face Scrub for men 2 - 3x per week to remove dead skin cells, facial impurities, & unclog pores for a more clear complexion.

Step 3: Apply our Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for men. Use in the morning to energize & protect your face. Use at night to firm the skin while you sleep.

Recommended for normal, to oily & combination skin.

Men's Daily Advanced Face Care Routine I - Gel Facial Cleanser Wash + Face Scrub + Face Moisturizer Lotion - Natural & Organic

 

Founded in 2014, co-founders Josh Meyer & Matt Bolduc were looking for premium men's skincare & grooming products, but couldn't find a brand that met their needs. They wanted products that were not only the best on the market, but also ones that used natural ingredients. They also were looking for a brand they could relate to as men, something for the every day man. After months of searching, they decided to take the matter into their own hands.

What started in Matt's garage, has turned into the fastest growing men's skincare & grooming company in the world, selling in over 20 countries and gracing the pages of GQ, Men's Journal, Men's Health & more.

 

Men's Daily Advanced Face Care Routine I

The complete daily skincare routine for men to maintain healthy skin. The three products in this men’s skin care kit work together to deliver a complete skincare routine that gives immediate and noticeable results. Designed for oily and normal skin types.

The Clarifying Gel Face Wash for men provides a rich, foaming experience that washes away oil using powerful coconut based cleansers. Aloe renews the skin and geranium acts as a powerful anti-septic cleansing away facial impurities. The result is a brighter, clearer complexion. Recommended for normal, to oily & combination skin.

The Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for men is a light, fast-absorbing oil free men's facial moisturizer packed with potent natural ingredients to hydrate, nourish, renew, and protect your face, without clogging pores. The result is clearer and firmer skin, keeping you looking younger, longer. This is an oil free face lotion for men.

Our Renewing Face Scrub for men uses powerful natural scrubbing particles to remove dead skin cells. It  unclogs pores, exfoliates and breaks down tough facial hair for better skin and a comfortable shave.

*For men with with dry or sensitive skin, check out our Advanced Face Care Routine II which includes our Purifying Charcoal Face Wash. 

How To Use:

 

Step 1: Wash your face morning & night with our Clarifying Gel Face Wash for men to remove facial impurities, oil, & shine which prevent a bright, clear complexion.

Step 2: Gently exfoliate your skin with our Renewing Face Scrub for men 2 - 3x per week to remove dead skin cells, facial impurities, & unclog pores for a more clear complexion.

Step 3: Apply our Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for men. Use in the morning to energize & protect your face. Use at night to firm the skin while you sleep.

Recommended for normal, to oily & combination skin.

. 

 

Made With Powerful, Natural Ingredients:

  • Coconut based cleansers powerfully clean the face of dead skin, dirt, and oil, without over drying.
  • Aloe nourishes and renews the skin by preventing over drying of the skin.
  • Geranium provides a powerful, natural anti-septic that removes facial impurities and excess pore clogging oil.
Renewing Face Scrub:
  • Jojoba Beads & Pumice: Effectively remove dead skin cells, dirt, and other impurities from your skin.
  • Aloe Vera, Avocado Butter & Vitamin E: Nourish the skin for a refreshed, moisturized feel.
  • Coffee Extract & Green Tea: Energize your skin and senses.

 

Daily Essential Face Moisturizer:

  • Aloe Vera penetrates the skin to supply moisture to your skin tissue.
  • Jojoba creates a protective cushion on your skin to reduce skin water loss.
  • Shea Butter nourishes the skin with Vitamins A, E, & F to alleviate dry skin and fine wrinkles.
  • Green Tea (along with Aloe Vera) provide robust anti-aging antioxidants to reverse signs of aging.
  • Hyaluronic Acid: Supplies the skin tissue with moisture and antioxidants to prevent wrinkles.

 

 

What Else Should You Know?

The men’s skin care products in this men’s skin care set are all natural & organic. They are scented with a refreshing essential oil blend of peppermint, eucalyptus, and lemongrass. Used twice daily, this men’s skin care kit lasts approximately 45 days.

All our products contain zero sulfates, parabens, glycols, phthalates, petrochemicals, silicones, PEG’s, sulfates, synthetic fragrances, or gluten. Always vegan, no animal testing, & premium organic ingredients.

8.0 x 4.1 x 2.6 inches

  • ANTI-AGING: Matcha Green Tea is rich in antioxidants that prevent the signs of aging in all skin types.
  • NOURISHING: Rich in Essential Oils, this scrub will leave skin looking clear and healthy whilst balancing oil production and helping to reduce blemishes and imperfections and acne.
  • BYE BYE CELLULITE: Caffeine rich Matcha Green Tea will help to reduce the appearance of cellulite and stretch marks.
  • 100% VEGAN: formulated with all natural, vegan and nutrient rich ingredients such as Bergamot Oil and Sweet Almond Oil.

Details: Matcha Green Tea Body Scrub was designed to renew and add vibrancy to all skin types. With a blend of perfect ingredients that benefit teenage and acne prone skin all the way to mature and dehydrated skin and anything in between, this body scrub is sure to be your new favorite purchase.

✦ Matcha Green Tea is packed with powerful antioxidants which are perfect for fighting the damaging effects of free radicals. The caffeine content helps to plump the skin and reduce the appearance of cellulite and stretch marks. Matcha is wonderful for clearing out clogged pores and helping to balance oil production without drying the skin out.

✦ Dead Sea Salt is rich in 21 minerals. It’s an incredible natural exfoliator for smooth and healthy skin. Each mineral it contains has its own therapeutic benefit ranging from helping to soothe sore muscles to improving multiple skin conditions.

✦ Sweet Almond Oil is packed with essential fatty acids which help to leave the skin moisturized, soft and smooth.

✦ Bergamot is a naturally effective cleanser that helps to unclog pores and balance the skins natural oil production. It is also incredibly soothing and helps to reduce redness and irritation on the skin. With a blend of some of the most soothing, exfoliating and skin refining ingredients, Matcha Green Tea Body Scrub is sure to be your new favorite body scrub.

body_html:

  • EASY FAST & CONVENIENT- Sprinkle the pepper flakes over salads, pastas, pizzas, creamy sauces etc., for a delicious Restaurant-like Home Cooked flavorful meal experience. Best seasoning to spice up the food with its intense and strong flavor.

 

  • MADE FOR HOME KITCHEN & RESTAURANT USE - Contains 1.6 oz (45 gm) in Small Dual Sifting Food Grade Jars and 14 oz (396 gm) in Large Dual Sifting Food Grade Jars for easy pour and storage. Spoon the spice or sprinkle it using sifter. Uplift the taste of your dishes by adding this sharp and hot flavor to your dishes. 

 

  • 100% AUTHENTIC TASTE & SATISFACTION GUARANTEED : Sprinkle red chili flakes over stews, curries as to experience an aromatic, sharp and spicy flavor Tasteful experience. Great Value as Little goes a long way. Best flavor is GUARANTEED or MONEY BACK.

 

  • GLUTEN Free, GMO Free, CHOLESTEROL Free, FAT Free, BPA Free, Non Bio engineered, VEGAN, Product of India

 

Pride Of India brings organically grown food and herbal products from India that enhance the overall health of the human body through the centuries long tradition of consuming pure foods from farm to table. We are a family owned company and source all our ingredients from direct farms in order to preserve the quality as well as freshness of all our products. We value sustainable farming and aim to build a company that benefits the entire food chain from the grass root level upwards. We are committed to sourcing the freshest organically grown spices from farms situated around the Indian subcontinent. Our organically cultivated pure spices render a wonderful cooking experience and ignite taste buds while improving overall health as well as balance of the body. Pride of India Organic Red Chili Flakes Hot is an authentic Indian spice which is used to make food spicier. It is a certified organic seasoning which adds pungent flavor to various types of cuisines such as Mexican, Thai, Indian etc. It is sharp in flavor and is sprinkled over salads, pizzas, pastas, tomato sauces, stews, curries etc. It is used in proportions and is great for veg and non-veg marinades. A must have spice in your kitchen that adds tastes to food dishes. Our customers are the most important link in fulfilling our aim and therefore, we strive to provide an unparalleled service in order to satisfy all our consumers to the best of our abilities.   • SPECIFICS: Size - 22" x 29" Art Print Edition Size - Limited Edition of 249 - The number delivered will be random.
  • CERTIFICATION: This art is delivered with a signed and dated Certificate of Authenticity.
  • FRAMING: This art is framed in a black floater frame and ready to hang in your home.

 

Binding:

Kitchen

 

Artist:

Mark Lewis


Details:


Elvis Presley limited edition wall decor canvas art prints. Created from an original painting titled "Reflections Of Purity" and printed at Mark Lewis' California studio. Each of these elegant prints is created on Breathing Color Lyve canvas.

They are then assembled surrounded by a sheik 2" matte black floating frame that measures 22" x 29". A limit of 249 art prints are available.

Each artwork is signed, numbered and delivered with a signed Certificate of Authenticity. The number delivered will be random based on the last artwork sold. 



MARK LEWIS ART:


These abstract art prints from his original paintings on canvas are a new evolution in his modern art category at an amazingly affordable price. Marks' decorative artwork decorates any room of your home. Mr. Lewis uses a particularly unique art painting technique that has made him a renowned pop art artist all around the world.

He is truly passionate about his artwork and it's decorative attributes. He settles for nothing less than perfection. With his vibrant color choices and painting skills, he has managed to capture our hearts with this fine art print collection of celebrities, musicians, and political icons.

He is also a living ancestor of Denton Cy Young the legendary baseball player and baseball Hall Of Fame recipient for which the Cy Young Award was created. Don't miss out on this limited chance to make your walls pop!

   

Package Dimensions:

36.0 x 30.0 x 5.0 inches

Details

Outdoor Backyard Patio Wood 5-Piece Sectional Sofa Seating Group Set with Cushions

 

5 Pieces Corner Design Patio Set

This sectional seating group comes with two corner sofas, one armless sofa, one ottoman, one tea table, 4 cushions and 3 back pillows. Featuring wooden X-back frames and classical blue cushions, this set brings a graceful look to any outdoor space. Enjoy your summertime with a cool drink with this spacious patio seating group!

 

Premium Hardwood Frame

This outdoor patio seating group is crafted with acacia wood, which is creating a naturally fine texture and a charming aesthetic. With this material, the set is designed for longevity because the wood is durable, sturdy and withstands climatic variations well. This strong resistance and natural durability make it perfect for outdoor products such as our sectional sofa sets.

 

Updated Cushions& Lockable Panels

Our cushions and pillows are covered with zippered fabric which is also water-resistant and UV-resistant. The whole cushions and pillows can be washed with a machine but hand-washing is recommended for long-time use. For easily using, all of the backs are connected with a lockable lock so that the parts of this set can be used separately or combined together as a seating group.

 

Widely Use& Easily Maintenance

Sectional X-back charming design makes the sofa set harmoniously decorated not only on patios but on decks, poolsides or balconies or wherever you want to put even in small places. Due to the hardwood material, the product is easy maintenance with a small brush or vacuum when dusting. Recommend to protect it with a tarp or other covering during extended periods of inclement weather for longevity.

 Function 


Defined mainly by a flat spring controlled upon deformation, so that the result is a straight movement relative to the ground. With the riser`s functional principle, depressive spring characteristic and backward movement of the force point during deformation are achieved. This supports the natural force point movement in the heels direction at higher loads and allows the runner to transpose his optimal jumping energy.



Hence, you can really fly!

Thanks to high-quality polyester fabric and elaborate stitching, this umbrella is durable enough to effectively block up harmful sunlight. And air-vented design on the canopy ensures adequate air circulation, also enhancing wind resistance and using stability.

[High Resilience Sponge] The filling material is made of highly resilient sponge,wrapped in a layer of non-woven fabric.Don't worry about collapse after use.

[Practical Design] An adjustable strap is designed at the back of the cushion cover, which greatly increases the adaptability of various types of chaise lounges.The seat cushion is also provided with lacable straps, hold the seat in place.

[Easy Care] Simply spot clean as needed with mild soap and warm water, then allow to air dry.

title: Outdoor Multi function Camping Survival Watch Bracelet Tools With LED
body_html:
Description:
Survival bracelets are made for military personnel, survivalists, preppers and everyday outdoorsman. Tested and proven by Special Operations, our series of paracord bands are specifically designed to provide you with the essential equipment for survival in the hardest of environments. This operations ban is not your typical paracord "survival" bracelet watch is designed to give you the components you can count on. Designed by special forces the components in the survival bracelet give you the 5 essential tools you need in every survival situation Fire, Compass, Rope, Knife and Whistle LED light and Timekeeping Waterproof Watch.

 

The Paracord is essential in almost every survival situation and has an unlimited number of uses

✔ Fishing
✔ Shoe Lace
✔ Making Shelter
✔ Sling for Broken Bones
✔ Reaching High Objects
✔ Lowering Heavy Objects
✔ Repairs
✔ Hunting Traps / Snares

Specifications:
  • Material: Nylon
  • Color: Black/Army Green
  • Size: 25.5 X 2 X 0.6cm(L X W X H


Functions:
  • Analog powered Waterproof Watch with Radium to glow in the Dark 
  • Bottle Opener- used in openings such as beer bottle cap
  • Scraper/Mini Knife - used in conjunction with fire/flint started and also for cutting cords
  • Flint/Fire Starter - must have to start fires, in order to survive for boiling water, cooking games,
  • Whistle - used for signaling help
  • LED light 
  • Unraveled paracord string - essential for tying down and securing camping equipment or gear

Package  :
1 X Paracord Bracelet with Flint Fire Starter and Compass with Watch

body_html:
Highlights

The rattan wicker chair has side mesh design with elegant atmosphere, its graceful curve blend classical and modern style to create an elegance area near pool or beach.

Crafted with all-weather PE rattan wicker on a metal frame, the rattan wicker chair is durable and sturdy for long time usage.

This PE rattan wicker chair backrest has six different slopes to meet different requirements of user.

The PE rattan wicker chair is easy to assemble for user and ship with an easy-to-follow instruction manual and all tools required. Wipe the PE rattan wicker chair with a damp cloth for daily cleaning.

Featured with fully foam-padded cushions and adjustable backrest, the PE rattan wicker chair offer the ultimate comfort and support to make user relaxed. The polyester fabric cover with smooth zipper is removable for easy washing.

Specification

Material:Wicker

Details

Outdoor patio pool PE rattan wicker chair wicker sun lounger, Adjustable backrest, beige cushion, Black wicker (1 set)

 

Product Description:

The PE rattan wicker chair brings out an incredible outdoor leisure area beside the pool that you desired for a long time, offer the excellent outdoor lounging experience. Spend time with your family members or friends around the pool in sunny days, chat with each other and take a sun bath, and enjoy the fun of swimming. Have a leisure time without calls and Emails. And you can read and listen to music laying on the rattan wicker chair. You can take this PE rattan wicker chair to the beach as well, and then enjoy your holidays there.

 

Our elegant PE rattan wicker chair has a side mesh design with a graceful curve, both classical and modern. The high-quality rattan plaited articles armrest allows you to experience the comfort of eliminating annoyances through fondling orderly arranged rattan articles. The adjustable backrest design can be set on six different slopes to meet the needs of different users. You can set it 110 degrees, and then read or chat with your friends freely. You can lean back in the rattan wicker chair to relax and admire the view if you set it 140 degrees. You can lay down when you set the chair 180 degrees to look at the blue sky and take a leisurely break.

STURDY&COMFORTABLE:

The patio chaise lounge are constructed from rust-resistant steel frame and all-weather PE rattan which is solid and durable. The cushions filled with 2.3" thick high resilience sponge for superb comfort and durable, breathable cushion cover with zipper is 220G polyester water repellent, easy to remove/replace and machine washable.

 

ADJUSTABLE:

The back of this recliner has 5 reclining positions with comfortable head pillow, you can adjust back of a chair according to your need, enjoy the comfort of different angle.

 

Please notice that the frame is steel, but the adjustable gear accessories are made of high toughness plastic, not steel. We will send spare parts for your standby together with the products.

 

EXTRA SPACE:


There is a shelving board on the right side of the lounge chair, more space for magazines or drinks and so on. It's perfect for your leisure time.

 

PACKAGE&ASSEMBLE:


The set include 2 piece chaise lounge and cushions. Assemble required, all the hardware and necessary tools are included, follow the clear instruction would be easy. This wicker chaise lounge will be shipped in 2 boxes, and 1 small box (spare parts: plastic adjusting gear parts), so totally 3 boxes shipped from US.

4 Take precaution during inclement weather conditions.

1. Product quality problems (missing parts, damage, etc.) need to be reshipped.

Please confirm with us whether it is possible to reship it to the customer first, and apply for RMA after the confirmation; if we reply that there is no stock and cannot reship, it is recommended to try a partial refund first, when it is not acceptable by the customer, try the full refund.

title: Outdoor Rocking Chairs All-Weather Resistant HDPE Poly Wood Resin Plastic, Humidity-Proof, Porch, Deck, Garden, Lawn, Backyard, Fire Pit, Garden Glider, Patio Rocker With High Backrest
body_html:
Highlights

1.[All-Weather Resistant HDPE Rocking Chairs] outdoor Rocking Chairs are made with a high-density polyethylene (HDPE). HDPE Lumber is a recyclable and environmentally friendly material. This material has astonishing performance in resistance to all types of weather.

2.[No Maintenance, No Crack, Rot and Splinter] Due to the exceptional resistance to all weathers and harmful substances, they will not rot, splinter, or crack.

3.[Well-Built Outdoor Rocker with High Backrest] This outdoor rocking chair has a timeless design and has a high backrest to fit your back line comfortably.

4.[Nice and Sturdy Humidity-Proof Rocker]The chairs are heavy duty and sturdy enough to stay upright through heavy winds and withstand the sun and rain.

5.[Low-Maintenance Chair with Recycled HDPE Lumber]This outdoor rocking chair adds more than just comfort and beauty to your deck. This eco-friendly HDPE is recycled lumber. That means it lasts for years with little maintenance required to keep it looking like new.

Details

1.[All-Weather Resistant HDPE Rocking Chairs] outdoor Rocking Chairs are made with a high-density polyethylene (HDPE). HDPE Lumber is a recyclable and environmentally friendly material. This material has astonishing performance in resistance to all types of weather. They have exceptional resistance to harmful substances, oil and fuels, salt spray, and other environmental stresses and the HDPE chairs do not absorb moisture.

2.[No Maintenance, No Crack, Rot and Splinter] Due to the exceptional resistance to all weathers and harmful substances, they will not rot, splinter, or crack. This outdoor rocking chair requires no extra waterproofing, painting, staining or other similar maintenance when used in many exterior applications like the porch, deck, patio, garden, lawn,backyard, fire pit, garden etc.

3.[Well-Built Outdoor Rocker with High Backrest] This outdoor rocking chair has a timeless design and has a high backrest to fit your back line comfortably. The seat has a certain curve for comfort seating. The chair base is sturdy and has smooth rocking. In terms of comfort and care, the patio rocking chairs are quite great, the seat is wide enough for most people. Instructions are very clear and easy to follow. To use a power drill will speed up screwing and hand tighten the screws for final torque as you do not want to over tighten and strip.

4.[Nice and Sturdy Humidity-Proof Rocker]The chairs are heavy duty and sturdy enough to stay upright through heavy winds and withstand the sun and rain.The chairs are well built to last for a long time. The rocking chair style is timeless and can be used for years and not out of date. The material HDPE is durable and also has a natural appearance like wood. It lasts longer than wood, considering the wood may fade slightly over the service life. The wood-like appearance makes the rocking chair has a nice looking not like some plastic-textured one. If you are looking for a rocking chair that won't break or wear out,this HDPE material rocker is made for you.

5.[Low-Maintenance Chair with Recycled HDPE Lumber] This outdoor rocking chair adds more than just comfort and beauty to your deck. This eco-friendly HDPE is recycled lumber. That means it lasts for years with little maintenance required to keep it looking like new. The genuine HDPE lumber is not prone to splinter, crack, chip, peel, or rot. The chair resists all weathers, food and beverage stains, environmental stresses and requires no painting or staining.

6.[Withstands extreme weather conditions] Rocking Chair brings you gentle rocking waves and enjoy the great outdoor scenery and have an ultra relaxation on your own deck or porch. Use the chair for years with the material withstands all extreme weather conditions including hot sun, big rain, snowy winters, and strong coastal winds.

title: Outdoor Wood Patio Backyard 4-Piece Sectional Seating Group with Cushions and Table X-Back Sofa Set for Small Places
body_html:
Specification

Material:Wood

Place of Origin:VNM

Cushion Pad:Foam

Details

Outdoor Wood Patio Backyard 4-Piece Sectional Seating Group with Cushions and Table X-Back Sofa Set for Small Places

 

4 Pieces Corner Design Patio Set

This sectional seating group comes with one right-side armchair, one left-side armchair, one corner piece, one tea table, 3 cushions and 6 back pillows. Featuring wooden X-back frames and classical gray cushions, this set brings a graceful look to any outdoor space especially small places like balconies with the corner design.

 

Premium Hardwood Frame

This outdoor patio seating group is crafted with acacia wood, which is creating a naturally fine texture and an charming aesthetic. With this material, the set is designed for longevity because the wood is durable, sturdy and withstands climatic variations well. This strong resistance and natural durability make it perfect for outdoor products like our patio sofa set.

 

Updated Cushions& Lockable Panels

Our cushions and pillows are covered with zippered fabric which is also water-resistant and UV-resistant. The whole cushions and pillows can be washed with machine but hand-washing is recommend for long-time using. For easily using, all of the backs are connected with a lockable lock so that the parts of this set can be used separately or combined together as a seating group.

 

Widely Use& Easily Maintenance

Sectional X-back charming design makes the sofa set harmoniously decoration not only in patios, but in decks, poolsides or balconies or wherever you want to put even in small places. Due to hardwood material, the product is easily maintenance with small brush or vacuum when dusting. Recommend to protect it with a tarp or other covering during extended periods of inclement weather for longevity.
